content: i am currently looking around for a community and the admins over at Tactical spoke very highly of you guys
Buf first i have some questions what is your core philosophy
ok i did not mean it like that for me it is never give up never surrender and be the best or go home
i ment it more like that
i would say fun is also the most important thing i think winning is fun
what are your plans in starbase?
so how do you stand towards piracy?
So finaly do you offer training

You see i come from Star citizen where i was part of a hardcore faction lead by an ex street fighter Pro as an admin. They concocted a prety good training called space jujitsu wich is regimented in lvls with lvl 0 being learn your ship do basic manuver training lvl one is go fight NPCs for a few months so you get realy good at dogging and weaving
i ams earching for stuff like this in starbase
ok thanks you guys seam promising together with Tactical and maby Collective
i still have to look at republic
